T02D2252:141b-1: she ka nir de sha n'a ma /
T02D2252:141b-3: dbang bskur ba nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2252:141b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2252:141b-5: gang las kun dga' skye 'gyur zhing //
T02D2252:141b-6: skad cig ma bzhi'i rgyur 'gyur gang //
T02D2252:141b-7: dbye bas byang chub grub pa'i phyir //
T02D2252:141b-8: ae wam rnam par phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2252:141b-9: drag po'i sbyor ba spangs ba yi //
T02D2252:141b-10: sna tshogs de nas rnam par smin //
T02D2252:141b-11: gsum pa mtshan nyid bral ba ste //
T02D2252:141b-12: rnam par nyed pa de nas shes //
T02D2252:141b-13: rnam nyed kun du spyod ce na //
T02D2252:141b-14: gsum pa ji ltar 'dod par byed //
T02D2252:141b-15: gang phyir de tshe dpyod med de //
T02D2252:141b-16: mtshan nyid med par rig par 'gyur //
T02D2252:141b-17: de phyir mtshan nyid bral bar rigs //
T02D2252:141b-18: de phyir gsum pa de nyid yin //
T02D2252:141b-19: rang gi nyid de dngos grub 'gyur//
T02D2252:141b-20: lung ston dang yang ldan pa yin //
T02D2252:141b-22: srub pa rnam par smin pa nyid //
T02D2252:141b-23: nor pu mtshan nyid bral zhes zer //
T02D2252:141b-24: de nas dbang bskur yang dag rigs //
T02D2252:141b-25: de ni dbang bskur ngan pa yin //
T02D2252:141b-26: rin chen dkyil du rang rig pa //
T02D2252:141b-27: gal te de nyid de yin na //
T02D2252:141b-28: zhi ba rig byed de nyid 'gyur //
T02D2252:141b-29: 'di ni sangs rgyas pa mi bzhed //
T02D2252:141b-30: de yang zhi bar nges par bsgrags //
T02D2252:141b-31: lha mos zhus pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2252:141b-32: lha mo rin chen grong khyer 'di //
T02D2252:141b-34: mnyam dus drag po zhi ba mchog / de nyid nus pa mchog gi mchog /
T02D2252:141b-35: mtshan nyid mtshon pa rnam bral ba //
T02D2252:141b-36: ngag gi mtshon pa rnams dang bral //
T02D2252:141b-37: zhi ba nus pa mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D2252:141b-38: rmad du byung ba'i bde ba mchog / nus pa'i yul du bsgom bya na //
T02D2252:141b-39: srid pa de nyid du na med //
T02D2252:141b-40: sgro btags thams cad nyams pa yin //
T02D2252:142a-4: zhi ba nus pa mnyam sbyor pa'i //
T02D2252:142a-5: dam pa bde ba mchog gnyis med //
T02D2252:142a-6: zhi min nus pa ma yin pa //
T02D2252:142a-7: rin chen dkyil du gnas pa'o //
T02D2252:142a-9: bya ba byas pa'i rnal 'byor bas //
T02D2252:142a-10: ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngoms gyur nas //
T02D2252:142a-11: bya ba cung zhig yod ma yin //
T02D2252:142a-12: yod na de nyid rig ma yin //
T02D2252:142a-13: rig byed kyi mtha' gsang bar smra ba las kyang /
T02D2252:142a-14: dbang bo yul las tshor min pa'i //
T02D2252:142a-15: ye shes nyi ma'i gzhung gis 'dod //
T02D2252:142a-16: tshor ba kun dga' tsam nyid de //
T02D2252:142a-17: legs ldan smra ba'i gzhung gis 'dod //
T02D2252:142a-18: nus dang phrad cing sbyor ba las //
T02D2252:142a-19: nus pa dbang gyur mthar thug pa //
T02D2252:142a-20: tshangs pa'i bde ba de nyid gang //
T02D2252:142a-21: bde des mngon sum grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2252:142a-22: der ni bde ba rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D2252:142a-23: sdug bsngal 'byung ba med pa yin //
T02D2252:142a-24: kun du dga' pa tshangs pa'i gzungs //
T02D2252:142a-25: de la thar pa zhes brjod do //
T02D2252:142a-26: cung zhig gang dang gang mthong ba //
T02D2252:142a-27: de dang de ni tshangs par brtags //
T02D2252:142a-28: des na sems ni gzhan mi 'gyur //
T02D2252:142a-29: tshangs pa nyid la rnam par gnas //
T02D2252:142a-30: gang gis mya ngan 'das mthong ba //
T02D2252:142a-31: chags pa chags pa'i sems nyid kyang //
T02D2252:142a-32: sdug pa mthong ba gnyis gcig pus //
T02D2252:142a-33: mthong ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya //
T02D2252:142a-34: chos dang chos min spangs nas ni //
T02D2252:142a-35: bden dang brdzun pa gnyi ga spangs //
T02D2252:142a-36: bden dang brdzun gnyis spangs nas su //
T02D2252:142a-37: gang zhig spangs pa de yang spangs //
T02D2252:142a-39: legs ldan gyi glu las kyang //
T02D2252:142a-40: dngos po bden pa yod ma yin //
T02D2252:142a-41: mi bden dngos kyang yod ma yin //
T02D2252:142a-42: de dag gnyi ga'i mtha' mthong ba //
T02D2252:142a-43: de yis de nyid mthong ba'o //
T02D2252:142a-46: gzung ba gzugs kyis stong pa'i sems //
T02D2252:142a-47: mi bskyod pa zhes brjod ce na //
T02D2252:142a-48: rang gi lung gis gnod pa yin //
T02D2252:142a-49: rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya ldan par //
T02D2252:142a-50: ci phyir 'di ltar nges pa ru //
T02D2252:142a-51: ston pa pos ni bstan pa yin //
T02D2252:142a-52: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa yis //
T02D2252:142a-53: dbugs dbyung blo yi dang por bstan //
T02D2252:142a-54: rdo rje nang gi rnam bcas skye //
T02D2252:142b-0: de yi rtse @142b mor rnam med skye //
T02D2252:142b-1: dbu mar gnas zhes gang smra ba //
T02D2252:142b-2: kho bo bla ma de mi 'dod //
T02D2252:142b-3: rdo rje'i nang dang de rtse dang //
T02D2252:142b-4: thod pa'i nang du lhung ba dang //
T02D2252:142b-6: de nyid bla ma'i kha las rig / dga' ba sna tshogs nyid du brjod //
T02D2252:142b-7: de la sogs pa legs gnas pa //
T02D2252:142b-8: nor bu'i nang du chud la sogs //
T02D2252:142b-9: bla mas bstan pa ji ltar sbyar //
T02D2252:142b-10: dgod la sogs pa'i dga' ba gang //
T02D2252:142b-11: slob dpon la sogs 'dod pa gang //
T02D2252:142b-12: de yi rnam gzhag bskyed rim la //
T02D2252:142b-13: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ma yin no //
T02D2252:142b-14: sna tshogs pas na mgrin sna tshogs //
T02D2252:142b-15: bde ba smin pa nor bu'i rtser //
T02D2252:142b-16: bla mas de nyid rnam shes bya //
T02D2252:142b-17: rnam nyed rnam bral dga' ba nyid //
T02D2252:142b-18: las kyi phyag rgya la bsten nas //
T02D2252:142b-19: chos kyi phyag rgya rnam par bsgom //
T02D2252:142b-20: de yi steng du phyag rgya che //
T02D2252:142b-21: gang las dam tshig yong 'byung ba'o //
T02D2252:142b-22: dga' ba phyag rgyas so so la //
T02D2252:142b-23: phyag rgya chen po ma rtogs par //
T02D2252:142b-24: lung dang rang gi rigs pa dang //
T02D2252:142b-25: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis //
T02D2252:142b-26: sna tshogs las kyi phyag rgya nyid //
T02D2252:142b-27: rnam smin 'gro ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2252:142b-28: de la mtshan bral brtan pa nyid //
T02D2252:142b-29: rnam nyed 'gro ba rnam lta ba //
T02D2252:142b-30: kun la rab tu mi gnas pa //
T02D2252:142b-31: phyag rgya che zhes grags pa yin //
T02D2252:142b-32: dri ma med phyir rang rig phyir //
T02D2252:142b-33: rnam pa sna tshogs sogs 'byung min //
T02D2252:142b-34: ye shes gang zhig 'bad med pa //
T02D2252:142b-35: bsam du med ces de brjod do //
T02D2252:142b-36: bsams nas gang zhig bsam med byed //
T02D2252:142b-37: de nyid bsam du med mi 'gyur //
T02D2252:142b-38: dbu ma'i don gyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D2252:142b-39: gang zhig de bzhin nyid mthong nas //
T02D2252:142b-40: mngon sum gang tshe rig gyur pa //
T02D2252:142b-41: de nyid rig de de nor ldan //
T02D2252:142b-42: ji snyed sgro btags thams cad ni //
T02D2252:142b-43: thams cad kun du med gyur pa //
T02D2252:142b-44: sgro btags med pa dbu ma'i don //
T02D2252:142b-45: de ni dgag sgrub gang zhig yod //
T02D2252:142b-46: shes dang shes byar ming 'dogs pa //
T02D2252:142b-47: snyam pa de ni gzhan ma yin //
T02D2252:142b-48: ji ltar de ltar kun sngon nas //
T02D2252:142b-49: ji ltar blo bzhin de ltar min //
T02D2252:142b-50: ma skyes 'gro bar gang yin blo //
T02D2252:142b-51: dag par sangs rgyas kyis nges bstan //
T02D2252:142b-53: blo dang ldan pas 'bad med par //
T02D2252:143a-1: 'brel pa sgom pa ma yin no //
T02D2252:143a-3: sems nyid 'khrul par ma byed cing //
T02D2252:143a-4: gnyen po'i phyogs la mi gnas shing //
T02D2252:143a-5: de nyid la yang mi chags ba //
T02D2252:143a-7: de yis phyag rgya chen po shes //
T02D2252:143a-8: ji ltar las kyi phyag rgya la //
T02D2252:143a-9: dga' ba la sogs gnas pa ltar //
T02D2252:143a-10: de bzhin dam tshig phyag rgya la //
T02D2252:143a-11: rdo rje slob dpon nye bar ston //
T02D2252:143a-12: las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs nyid //
T02D2252:143a-13: chos kyi phyag rgya rnam smin skyes //
T02D2252:143a-14: mtshan nyid bral ba phyag rgya che //
T02D2252:143a-15: rnam par nyed pa dam tshig 'gyur //
T02D2252:143a-16: phyag rgya chen po mi shes par //
T02D2252:143a-17: las kyi phyag rgya gcig sgrub pa //
T02D2252:143a-18: brgyud pa'i de nyid la nyams pas //
T02D2252:143a-20: ji srid gtso bor ri khrod pa'i //
T02D2252:143a-21: zhabs kyi rdul lam reg par //
T02D2252:143a-22: de srid phyag rgya bzhi dang ni //
T02D2252:143a-23: skad cig ma bzhi mi shes so //
T02D2252:143a-24: mgon po chos nyid ji lta bu //
T02D2252:143a-25: chos rnams thams cad rnam dag pa //
T02D2252:143a-26: ji lta bur ni rnyed 'gyur gsungs //
T02D2252:143a-27: chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
T02D2252:143a-28: yang dag dbang bskur cho ga'i don //
T02D2252:143a-29: drag po'i dbang bskur ngan spangs pas //
T02D2252:143a-30: bdag gis gang byas bsod nams des //
T02D2252:143a-31: 'gro ba rnams ni bde gyur cig / dbang bskur ba nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2252:143a-32: slob dpon rgyal ba mee tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2252:143a-34: // rgya gar gyi mkhan po krishna: pandi ta dang /
